revision.text:
{{Notability|date=May 2008}}
[[File:Adelphi-theatre-1840.jpg|thumb|right|The Hampshire Hog to the right of the [[Adelphi Theatre]], 1840]]
'''The Hampshire Hog''' was a tavern at 410 The Strand, London, next door to The [[Adelphi Theatre]].
Its trade relied heavily on visitors to the theatre.
The pub was taken over in 1887 (along with the house next door and the [[Nell Gwynne]] tavern in Bull Inn Court) by the Adelphi Theatre (at the time run by the Gatti family.) The Hampshire Hog was renovated and absorbed into the theatre complex.
A new enlarged facade was built as part of the renovation, and this can still be seen today.
==Publicans==
*1803 Ann Goodall *1815 Thomas Hart *1829 William Robert Burgess *1839 Thomas Salter *1851 Benjamin O Conquest *1869 Daniel Chalker *1881 Caroline Hubert *1882 John Young
==External links== *Adelphi Theatre takes over Hampshire Hog [http://www.arthurlloyd.co.uk/Adelphi.htm] *Partial image of the Hampshire Hog to the right of the theatre, 1857 [http://www.civilwargazette.com/WP/images/BW_adelphi_theatre_57054.jpg]
*Mentioned in testimony at the Old Bailey, 1763[http://www.hrionline.ac.uk/luceneweb/bailey/highlight.jsp?ref=t17630914-52&words=Hampshire%20AND%20Hog%20AND%20Strand#firsthil] *Mentioned in testimony at the Old Bailey, 1786 [http://www.hrionline.ac.uk/luceneweb/bailey/highlight.jsp?ref=t17861213-7&words=Hampshire%20AND%20Hog%20AND%20Strand#firsthil] *Mentioned in testimony at the Old Bailey, 1803 [http://www.hrionline.ac.uk/luceneweb/bailey/highlight.jsp?ref=t18030420-68&words=Hampshire%20AND%20Hog%20AND%20Strand#firsthil] *Mentioned in testimony at the Old Bailey, 1811 [http://www.hrionline.ac.uk/luceneweb/bailey/highlight.jsp?ref=t18110220-82&words=Hampshire%20AND%20Hog%20AND%20Strand#firsthil] *Mentioned in testimony at the Old Bailey, 1813 [http://www.hrionline.ac.uk/luceneweb/bailey/highlight.jsp?ref=t18130217-21&words=Hampshire%20AND%20Hog%20AND%20Strand#firsthil] *Mentioned in testimony at the Old Bailey, 1815 [http://www.hrionline.ac.uk/luceneweb/bailey/highlight.jsp?ref=t18151025-8&words=Hampshire%20AND%20Hog%20AND%20Strand#firsthil] *Mentioned in testimony at the Old Bailey, 1817 [http://www.hrionline.ac.uk/luceneweb/bailey/highlight.jsp?ref=t18171203-143&words=Hampshire%20AND%20Hog%20AND%20Strand#firsthil]
